DOC.brief_summary: The aim study determine relationship percentage calorie dairy intake long-term glycemic control weight maintenance patient type 2 diabetes participate intensive lifestyle intervention program . The investigator hypothesize overweight obese patient type 2 diabetes consume high percentage calorie dairy product intensive lifestyle intervention program well glycemic control maintenance weight loss compare consume low percentage calorie dairy product .
DOC.brief_title: Effect Dairy Consumption Glycemic Control , Body Weight Cardiovascular Risk Factors
DOC.detailed_description: This prospective , observational clinical study daily intake dairy product record analyze 50 overweight/obese subject type 2 diabetes enrol Weight Achievement Intensive Treatment ( Why WAIT ) program . The Weight Achievement Intensive Treatment ( Why WAIT ) program 12-week multidisciplinary program develop Joslin Diabetes Center intensive diabetes weight management clinical practice . It include follow component provide group set : ( 1 ) intensive medical treatment provide endocrinologist registered nurse ; ( 2 ) structure dietary plan provide registered dietitian ; ( 3 ) individualize exercise training program provide exercise physiologist ; ( 4 ) cognitive behavioral modification provide behavioral therapist . Participants enrol study period 24 week . They attend Weight Achievement Intensive Treatment ( Why WAIT ) program first 12 week study follow another 12 week program ( maintenance phase ) . During intervention phase , participant receive group education weekly basis 12 consecutive week . During maintenance phase , participant receive monthly , 15 minute long , follow phone call study dietitian . Participants instruct complete 3-day food log visit . They also ask record dairy intake daily basis dedicate log book . These log collect analyzed study dietitian . Dairy consumption calculate sum serving per day milk , cheese , yogurt , dairy food .
DOC.criteria: 1 . Subject participate Weight Achievement Intensive Treatment ( Why WAIT ) program 2 . Subject male female age 1875 3 . Subject type 2 diabetes least three month prior screen treat antihyperglycemic medication 1 . Subject pregnant lactating 2 . Subject heart pacemaker
